Items.Results: say,The guard likes to play games of chance. If you lose he will take something you own but if you win you can take something that he owns. To play a dice game with him use the command 'playdice guard'.  If you have more than one die he won't let you choose which one you use.

Places.Description: You are in a room with blue walls.  There is a green door in the north wall, a yellow door in the western wall and a cupboard door in the eastern wall. There is a Persian rug on the floor.
You are in a store cupboard.  There are some shelves in the cupboard. There is a cupboard door to the west going back to the room.
You are in a small room with a narrow, sloping roof. There is a rocking chair in the room and a bare bed up against one of the walls.  There is a green door in the southern wall.
You are in a long, empty corridor.  There is a yellow door in the eastern wall and a room at the western end of the corridor.

You are in a guardroom.  There is a metal silver door leading to a jail cell in the southern wall, there is a gold metal door leading to a jail cell in the northern wall.  There is a clear desk with a chair behind it.  Sitting in the chair is a guard.  There is a corridor going eastwards.
You are in a jail cell.  To the south there is a gold door.
You are in a jail cell.  There is a skeleton in the corner.  To the north there is a silver door.
You are in a cellar.  There is a ladder going up.  There is a shelf going around the wall and a barrel on the floor.
